18.5. Autocorrelation Analysis 360
lags = 365
# acf
axis = pyplot.subplot(2, 1, 1)
plot_acf(series, ax=axis, lags=lags)
# pacf
axis = pyplot.subplot(2, 1, 2)
plot_pacf(series, ax=axis, lags=lags)
# show plot
pyplot.show()
Listing 18.6: Example of creating ACF and PACF plots from the training dataset.
Running the example creates a single Ô¨Ågure with both ACF and PACF plots. The plots are
very dense, and hard to read. Nevertheless, we might be able to see a familiar autoregression
